## ListDefinition type

Provides information about how a list of values should be represented to the user.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ListDefinition = {
    $type?: string;
    Height?: number;
    Type?: ListType;
};
```

**References:** [ListType](./open-api-client.listtype.md)
